card.name: Arrest
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can’t attack or block and its activated abilities can’t be activated.

card.name: Bantha Herd
card.text: XXW: Monstrosity X (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put X +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) When this creature becomes monstrous, create twice X 1/1 white Tusken Raider creature tokens.

card.name: The Battle of Hoth
card.text: (As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.) When this battle enters, create X 5/5 white artifact AT-AT creature tokens with “When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white Trooper creature tokens.” --- 2W, T: Create a token that’s a copy of target untapped creature you control that didn’t enter this turn.

card.name: The Battle of Scarif
card.text: (As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.) When this battle enters, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. --- 2, T: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Battle Tactics
card.text: Creatures you control get +2/+1 and gain lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Cantina Band
card.text: 1, T: Tap target nonartifact creature.

card.name: Condemn
card.text: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner’s library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.

card.name: Deploy the Troops
card.text: Create three 1/1 white Trooper creature tokens.

card.name: Droideka
card.text: 2U: Change a target of target spell or ability to this creature. Repair 3 (When this creature dies, put three repair counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a repair counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: EMP Blast
card.text: Exile target artifact. Tap all other artifacts.

card.name: Escape Pod
card.text: Exile target creature you control. Return that card to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Force Healing
card.text: Choose a color. You and up to one target creature you control gain hexproof from that color until end of turn. scry 1.

card.name: Gifted Initiate
card.text: When this creature enters, you may tap target creature. If you do, tap this creature. 1W: Meditate. (Return this creature to its owner’s hand. The first Jedi spell you cast on your next turn costs 2 less to cast. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Heavy Trooper
card.text: Troopers you control get +0/+1.

card.name: Ion Cannon
card.text: Defender T: Target creature loses capital ship, flying, and all creature types until end of turn.

card.name: Jedi Battle Healer
card.text: Lifelink When this creature enters, you gain 2 life. 1W: Meditate. (Return this creature to its owner’s hand. The first Jedi spell you cast on your next turn costs 2 less to cast. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Jedi Inquirer
card.text: When this creature enters, exile up to one target battle, enchantment, or card in a graveyard. 2W: Meditate. (Return this creature to its owner’s hand. The first Jedi spell you cast on your next turn costs 2 less to cast. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Jedi Instructor
card.text: When this creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one other target creature. 1W: Meditate

card.name: Jedi Reflexes
card.text: Untap target creature. It gets +2/+2 until end of turn and can block an additional creature this turn.

card.name: Jedi Starfighter
card.text: Flying When this creature enters, up to two target Jedi you control gain flying until end of turn. 1W: Meditate. (Return this creature to its owner’s hand. The first Jedi spell you cast on your next turn costs 2 less to cast. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: LAAT Gunship
card.text: Whenever this creature attacks, create a 1/1 white Trooper creature token that’s tapped and attacking. W: This creature gains flying until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Lando Calrissian
card.text: Lando Calrissian has first strike as long as he’s attacking. At the beginning of combat on your turn, target Starship you control gets +1/+1 and gains vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Loyal Tauntaun
card.text: 1G: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.) When this creature dies, return target creature card with lesser toughness from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Maintenance Hangar
card.text: Starships you control have repair 6. (Whenever a Starship dies, put six repair counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a repair counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.) When maintenance hangar enters, put 6 repair counters on each Starship card in your graveyard. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove an additional repair counter from each card in your graveyard.

card.name: Miraculous Recovery
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Nebulon-B Frigate
card.text: Capital ship (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with capital ship or flying.) When this creature enters, creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Orbital Bombardment
card.text: Destroy all non-Starship creatures.

card.name: Plo Koon
card.text: Flash You may activate meditate abilities any time you could cast an instant. 1W: Meditate

card.name: Princess Leia
card.text: Other Rebels you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance. When Princess Leia enters, create three 1/1 white Rebel creature tokens. When Princess Leia dies, you may pay 1U. If you do, return her to your hand.

card.name: Riding Ronto
card.text: Vigilance 3W: Monstrosity 2. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

card.name: Sand Trooper
card.text: Troopers you control have vigilance.

card.name: Security Droid
card.text: When this creature enters, create a 1/1 colorless Droid artifact creature token. Repair 3 (When this creature dies, put three repair counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a repair counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: Snow Trooper
card.text: Troopers you control have first strike.

card.name: Womp Rat
card.text: 1W: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.) When this creature becomes monstrous, it gains lifelink and vigilance until end of turn. Exile up to one target card from a graveyard.

card.name: X-Wing
card.text: Flying, vigilance

card.name: Admiral Ackbar
card.text: When you cast this spell, create two 2/2 blue Rebel Starship artifact creature tokens with flying named B-Wing. At the beginning of each upkeep, untap all Starships you control. Whenever two or more Starships you control attack, draw a card.

card.name: Armed Protocol Droid
card.text: Flash Sacrifice this creature: You may cast artifact spells as though they had flash this turn. Repair 3 (When this creature dies, put three repair counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a repair counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: The Battle of Kamino
card.text: (As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.) When this battle enters, return up to one target artifact or creature to its owner’s hand. --- 2, T, Sacrifice this artifact: Copy target creature spell you control.

card.name: The Battle of Naboo
card.text: (As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.) When this battle enters, return up to X target creatures to their owner’s hands. Draw twice X cards. --- Creatures can’t attack you unless their controller pays 2 for each creature they control that’s attacking you.

card.name: Cloaking Device
card.text: Flash Enchant creature When this Aura enters, enchanted creature gains hexproof until end of turn. Whenever enchanted creature attacks, defending player loses 1 life.

card.name: Force Denial
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays 2. Hate — If an opponent lost life this turn, counter that spell instead. Scry 1.

card.name: Force Push
card.text: Return target creatue to its owner’s hand. Its controller loses 1 life.

card.name: Force Repulse
card.text: The owner of target spell or nonland permanent puts it on the top or bottom of their library. Scry 1.

card.name: Gungan Captain
card.text: Vigilance Whenever Gungan Captain deals damage to a creature, tap that creature and put a stun counter on it.

card.name: Jar Jar Binks
card.text: Jar Jar Binks can’t block. When Jar Jar Binks enters, target opponent gains control of him. At the beginning of combat on your turn, tap a creature with the greatest power among creatures you control.

card.name: Jedi Battle Mage
card.text: When this creature enters, tap target creature an opponet controls and put a stun counter on it. 1U: Meditate. (Return this creature to its owner’s hand. The first Jedi spell you cast on your next turn costs 2 less to cast. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Jedi Mind Trick
card.text: You control target player during that player’s next turn.

card.name: Jedi Training
card.text: Meditate abilities you activate cost 1 less to activate. Whenever a Jedi you control leaves the battlefield without dying, scry 1.

card.name: Jump to Hyperspace
card.text: Return all attacking creatures to their owner’s hands.

card.name: Jump Trooper
card.text: Troopers you control have ward 2.

card.name: Mace Windu
card.text: Flash When Mace Windu enters, return target spell or creature you don’t control to its owner’s hand. 1U: Meditate. (Return this creature to its owner’s hand. The first Jedi spell you cast on your next turn costs 2 less to cast. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Mon Calamari Cruiser
card.text: Capital ship (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with capital ship or flying.) Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player or battle, draw a card.

card.name: Mon Calamari Initiate
card.text: When this creature enters, draw a card. 1U: Meditate. (Return this creature to its owner’s hand. The first Jedi spell you cast on your next turn costs 2 less to cast. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Ortolan Keyboardist
card.text: T: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Personal Energy Shield
card.text: Counter target spell that targets you or a permanent you control.

card.name: Preordain
card.text: Scry 2, then draw a card.

card.name: Probe Droid
card.text: When this creature enters, target player reveals their hand. Repair 3 (When this creature dies, put three repair counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a repair counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: Republic Frigate
card.text: Flying Whenever a Trooper you control enters, untap this creature.

card.name: Rumination
card.text: Draw three cards, then put a card from your hand on top of your library.

card.name: Shadow Trooper
card.text: Flash You may cast Trooper spells as though they had flash.

card.name: Sith Manipulator
card.text: When this creature enters, return up to one target artifact or creature to its owner’s hand. Hate — If an opponent lost life this turn, put that permanent on top of its owner’s library instead.

card.name: Sith Sorcerer
card.text: When this creature enters, scry 2. Hate — When this creature dies, if an opponent lost life this turn, draw a card.

card.name: Spider Droid
card.text: Repair 5 (When this creature dies, put five repair counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a repair counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.) Whenever a nontoken creature you control leaves the battlefield while this card is in your graveyard, you may remove a repair counter from this card.

card.name: Super Battle Droid
card.text: Repair 2 (When this creature dies, put two repair counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a repair counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: Surprise Maneuver
card.text: Untap target creature. Draw a card.

card.name: Ugnaught Scrap Worker
card.text: Droid spells you cast cost 1 less to cast.

card.text: Flying Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player or battle, you may pay 1. If you do, tap target creature that player controls and put a stun counter on it.

card.name: Zam Wesell
card.text: As Zam Wesell enters, each opponent reveals their hand. You may have Zam Wesell enter as a copy of any creature card from among those cards. If you don’t, draw a card when Zam Wesell enters.

card.name: Acquire Target
card.text: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life. Put a bounty counter on up to one target permanent an opponent controls.

card.name: Aqualish Bounty Hunter
card.text: When this creature enters, put a bounty counter on target permanent. Bounty — Whenever a permanent an opponent controls with a bounty counter on it is put into a graveyard, target player discards a card.

card.name: The Battle of Utapau
card.text: (As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.) When this battle enters, return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. --- At the beginning of your end step, you draw a card and lose 1 life.

card.name: The Battle of Yavin
card.text: (As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.) When this battle enters, for each nonland permanent an opponent controls, that player sacrifices it unless they pay X life. --- Each opponent sacrifices a legendary permanent. If an opponent can’t, that player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Bib Fortuna
card.text: When Bib Fortuna enters, search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card on top. You lose 1 life. When Bib Fortuna dies, shuffle.

card.name: Black Market Dealer
card.text: Whenever this creature or another outlaw you control dies, put a bounty counter on target permanent. (Hunters, Pirates, and Rogues are outlaws.) Bounty ― Whenever a permanent an opponent controls with a bounty counter on it is put into a graveyard, target player loses 1 life and draws a card.

card.name: Bludgeoning Pain
card.text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. Tap that creature.

card.name: Bounty Spotter
card.text: This creature doesn’t untap during your untap step. T: Put a bounty counter on target permanent. Bounty — Whenever a permanent an opponent controls with a bounty counter on it is put into a graveyard, untap this creature.

card.name: Death Trooper
card.text: Each Trooper card in your graveyard has unearth 2. Unearth 2 (2: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Dengar
card.text: When Dengar enters, put a bounty counter on target permanent. Whenever a permanent an opponent controls with a bounty counter on it is put into a graveyard, return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand unless an opponent pays 3 life.

card.name: Doom Blade
card.text: Destroy target nonblack creature.

card.name: Droid Commando
card.text: When this creature dies, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. Repair 3 (When this creature dies, put three repair counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a repair counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: Force Drain
card.text: Force Drain deals 2 damage to any target. You gain 2 life. Scry 1.

card.name: Grand Moff Tarkin
card.text: At the beginning of each opponent’s upkeep, destroy target creature that player controls unless that player pays 2 life or discards a card.

card.name: Hazard Trooper
card.text: Each Trooper you control can’t be blocked except by creatures that share a color with it.

card.name: Head Hunting
card.text: Put a bounty counter on target permanent. Each opponent loses 1 life. Draw a card.

card.name: IG-88B
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever IG-88B deals combat damage to a player, planeswalker, or battle, defending player loses life equal to the number of bounty counters on permanents they control. Repair 3 (When this creature dies, put three repair counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a repair counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: Insatiable Rakghoul
card.text: This creature enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on it if a nonartifact creature died this turn.

card.name: Interrogation
card.text: Target player discards a card. Then thay player discards another card unless they pay 3 life.

card.name: Korriban Tomb Guardian
card.text: This creature enters tapped. Hate — 1B: Return this creature from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only if an opponent lost life this turn.

card.name: Neophyte Hateflayer
card.text: T, Pay 1 life: Each opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Open Season
card.text: When this enchantment enters, put a bounty counter on target permanent. Activated abilities of nonland permanents your opponents control with boutny counters on them can’t be activated. Bounty — Whenever a permanent an opponent controls with a bounty counter on it is put into a graveyard,that player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Order 66
card.text: This spell costs 2 less to cast if an opponent controls a Jedi. Put a bounty counter on each creature you don’t control, then destroy those creatures.

card.name: Repurpose
card.text: Destroy target creature. Return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Rule of Two
card.text: As long as you control exactly two creatures, those creatures get +2/+0 and have deathtouch and lifelink.

card.name: Sith Assassin
card.text: Hate — When this creature enters, if an opponent lost life this turn, destroy up to one target nonblack creature.

card.name: Sith Evoker
card.text: Lifelink Hate — When this creature enters, if an opponent lost life this turn, return target creature or planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Sith Executioner
card.text: Hate — 1B, Discard a card, Sacrifice a Sith: Draw two cards. Activate only if an opponent lost life this turn.

card.name: Sith Inquisitor
card.text: Hate — When this creature enters, if an opponent lost life this turn, target player discards a card at random.

card.name: Sith Lord
card.text: Menace This creature enters with X +1/+1 on it, where X is the amount life your opponents lost this turn.

card.name: Sith Thoughtseeker
card.text: Hate — 2U, Pay 1 life: Draw a card. Activate only if an opponent lost life this turn and only once each turn.

card.name: Swarm the Skies
card.text: Create three 1/1 black Starship artifact creature tokens with flying named TIE Fighter.

card.name: TIE Bomber
card.text: Flying Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice it. If you do, destroy target creature defending player controls.

card.name: TIE Interceptor
card.text: Flying Whenever this creature attacks, each opponent loses 2 life.

card.name: Unruly Sureshot
card.text: When this creature enters, put a bounty counter on target permanent. 3R: This creature deals 2 damage to target creature with a bounty counter on it.

card.name: A-Wing
card.text: Flying, haste 1: Remove this creature from combat. Until the end of your next turn, it attacks each combat if able.

card.name: The Battle of Coruscant
card.text: (As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.) When this battle enters, you may discard a card or sacrifice a land. If you do, draw two cards. Creatures with capital ship or flying that are attacking this battle can’t be blocked. Excess damage those creatures would deal to this battle is dealt to defending player instead. --- Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don’t control.

card.name: The Battle of Geonosis
card.text: (As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.) When this battle enters, it deals X damage to each opponent and each creature they control. Creatures you control get +X/+0 until end of turn. --- Exile up to two target artifacts and/or artifact cards in a graveyard.

card.text: T: This creature deals 1 damage to any target. Bounty ― Whenever a permanent an opponent controls with a bounty counter on it is put into a graveyard, untap this creature.

card.name: Capture
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. If it has a bounty counter on it, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Crossfire
card.text: Crossfire deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature’s controller.

card.name: Dark Apprenticeship
card.text: Hate — At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent lost life this turn, you may pay 1. If you do, this enchantment deals 2 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Flames of Remembrance
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile a card from your graveyard. If you do, put a lore counter on this enchantment. Sacrifice this enchantment: Exile the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of lore counters on it. Until end of turn, you may play cards exiled this way.

card.name: Force Lightning
card.text: Force Lightning deals X damage to any target. Scry X.

card.name: Force Scream
card.text: Force Scream deals 3 damage to each non-Starship creature and each player. Scry 1.

card.name: Force Spark
card.text: Force Spark deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets. Scry 1.

card.name: Gamorrean Prison Guard

card.name: Impulsive Wager

card.text: Bounty — Whenever a permanent an opponent controls with a bounty counter on it is put into a graveyard, this creature deals 2 damage to target player, planeswalker, or battle.

card.name: Rallying Fire
card.text: Rallying Fire deals damage to any target equal to the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Revenge
card.text: Target creature you control gets +4/+0 until end of turn if you lost life this turn. Then it fights target creature you don’t control.

card.text: Whenever you attack with one or more other Sith, this creature deals 1 damage to target opponent. Hate — 1R: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Activate only if an opponent lost life this turn.

card.name: Jedi Battle Sage
card.text: Flash When Jedi Battle Sage enters, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. 1G: Meditate. (Return this creature to its owner’s hand. The first Jedi spell you cast on your next turn costs 2 less to cast. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Ki-Adi-Mundi
card.text: When Ki-Adi-Mundi enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control. 1G: Meditate. (Return this creature to its owner’s hand. The first Jedi spell you cast on your next turn costs 2 less to cast. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Legacy of the Beloved
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Search your library for up to two creature cards each with mana value less than the sacrificed creature’s mana value, put them on to the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Mantellian Savrip
card.text: 5GG: Monstrosity 2. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) Creatures with power less than this creature’s power can’t block it.

card.name: Massif Swarm
card.text: 1G: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.)

card.name: Millenium Falcon
card.text: Flash Flying When Millenium Falcon enters, creatures you control gain hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Nerf Herder
card.text: Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are placed on a creature you control, you may pay 2. If you do, draw a card. Monstrous creatures you control have trample.

card.name: Nexu Stalker
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn’t monstrous, it becomes monstrous. XXG: This creature gets +X/+X until end of turn. Activate only if this creature is monstrous.

card.name: Nightspider
card.text: Deathtouch 4G: Monstrosity 2. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

card.name: No Contest
card.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don’t control. Excess damage is dealt to that creature’s controller.

card.name: Regression
card.text: Choose target artifact or enchantment. Its owner shuffles it into their library.

card.name: Scout the Perimeter
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Put a bounty counter on target permanent.

card.name: Scout Trooper
card.text: Troopers you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Shaak Herd
card.text: 1G: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.) When this creature dies, you may return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Show of Dominance
card.text: Put four +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. That creature gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Trooper Commando
card.text: Troopers you control have trample.

card.name: Twilek Seductress
card.text: This creature must be blocked if able. Whenever this creature becomes blocked by a creature, put a bounty counter on that creature.

card.name: Wookie Bounty Hunter
card.text: Bounty — Whenever a permanent an opponent controls with a bounty counter on it is put into a graveyard, you gain 3 life.

card.name: AAT-1
card.text: Whenever a repair counter is removed from a card in your graveyard, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. Repair 4 (When this creature dies, put four repair counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a repair counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: Acklay of the Arena
card.text: 2RGW: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.) Whenever a creature you control becomes monstrous, it fights target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Adroit Hateflayer
card.text: Menace Whenever this creature attacks, each player loses 2 life.

card.name: Amidala Queen of Naboo
card.text: Whenever Amidala or another creature you control enters, you gain 1 life. At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 5 or more life this turn, destroy up to one target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Anakin Skywalker
card.type: Legendary Creature - Human Sith // Legendary Creature - Human Sith
card.text: Whenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Anakin Skywalker. Sacrifice another creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery. If Anakin Skywalker would die, regenerate and transform him instead. --- Menace, lifelink Whenever Darth Vader attacks, creatures defending player controls get -1/-1 until end of turn for each +1/+1 counter on Darth Vader.

card.name: Asajj Ventress
card.text: Double strike Whenever a creature blocks Asajj Ventress, she gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Hate — Whenever Asajj Ventress attacks, if an opponent lost life this turn, up to one target creature blocks this turn if able.

card.name: Aurra Sing Bane of Jedi
card.text: +1 Put a bounty counter on up to one target creature, battle, or planeswalker. Aurra Sing deals 2 damage to that permanent and 1 damage to you. -4 Target player gets an emblem with “Whenever a nontoken creature you control leaves the battlefield, discard a card or lose 3 life.” -6 Each player discards their hand. Exile all creatures. Each player’s life total becomes 1.

card.name: Blind Worship
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks, each other creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is enchanted creature’s power.

card.name: Boba Fett
card.text: Menace, deathtouch, haste When Boba Fett enters, put a bounty counter on target permanent. Bounty ― Whenever a permanent an opponent controls with a bounty counter on it is put into a graveyard, you may draw two cards. If you do, discard two cards.

card.name: Bull Rancor
card.text: Trample 1RGW: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.) As long as this creature is monstrous, creatures you control have menace.

card.name: C-3PO and R2-D2
card.text: When C-3PO and R2-D2 leaves the battlefield, you gain 4 life and draw a card. Repair 2 (When this creature dies, put two repair counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a repair counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: Carbonite Chamber
card.text: Enchant creature When this Aura enters, remove a bounty counter from up to one target permanent. You control enchanted creature. It can’t attack or block, and its activated abilities can’t be activated.

card.name: Chewbacca
card.text: Vigilance Whenever Chewbacca attacks alone, if he isn’t monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on him and he becomes monstrous. Whenever a creature you control becomes monstrous, that creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Chief Chirpa
card.text: 2RGW: Monstrosity 2. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) Whenever a green creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on another target Ewok you control. Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on Chief Chirpa, create that many 1/1 green Ewok creature tokens.

card.name: Commander Cody
card.text: Whenever one or more nontoken Troopers you control attack, create that many 1/1 white Trooper creature tokens that are tapped and attacking.

card.name: Cruelty of the Sith
card.text: Choose one — - Counter target noncreature spell. - Target player sacrifices a creature. - Cruelty of the Sith deals 3 damage to target player or battle. That player or that battle’s protector discards a card.

card.name: Cunning Abduction
card.text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it and exile that card. You may cast that card as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast that spell.

card.name: Dagobah Maw Slug
card.text: 2RGW: Monstrosity 2. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) Whenever a creature you control becomes monstrous, it gains hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Dark Decision
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay 1 life. Look at the top 10 cards of your library, exile a card from among them, then shuffle. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.

card.name: Darth Maul
card.text: Double strike, haste Hate — Whenever Darth Maul attacks, if an opponent lost life this turn, up to one target creature can’t block Darth Maul this turn.

card.name: Darth Sidious Sith Lord
card.text: +3 Destroy target noncreature permanent. -2 Gain control of target creature. -9 Darth Sidious deals 7 damage to target player. That player discards seven cards, then sacrifices seven permanents.

card.name: Darth Tyranus Count of Serenno
card.text: +1 Until your next turn, attacking creatures your opponents control get -1/-0. 0 Draw a card. Each player loses 1 life. -4 Sacrifice an artifact. If you do, search your library for an artifact card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Echo Base Commando
card.text: Protection from Beasts Activated abilities of creatures your opponents control cost 2 more to activate.

card.name: Ferocity of the Underworld
card.text: Choose one — - Destroy target nonland permanent. - Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. - Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Force Awakening
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has lifelink. When this Aura enters, distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two target creatures. 1U: Return this Aura and enchanted creature to their owners’ hands. The first Jedi or Aura spell you cast during your next turn costs 2 less to cast.

card.name: Force Choke
card.text: Counter target spell. Its controller may pay life equal to its mana value to return it to its owner’s hand. Scry 2.

card.name: Force Deflection
card.text: Counter target noncreature spell. Its controller loses 2 life.

card.name: Force Mastery
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put it into your hand. You gain life equal to its mana value.

card.name: General Grievous
card.text: Double strike Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on General Grievous.

card.name: Greater Krayt Dragon
card.text: Trample XXRGW: Monstrosity X. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put X +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) When this creature becomes monstrous, draw a card for each +1/+1 counter on creatures you control.

card.name: Greedo
card.text: Creatures blocking or blocked by Greedo have first strike. When Greedo dies, you may search your library for an outlaw creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. (Hunters, Pirates, and Rogues are outlaws.)

card.name: Hondo Ohnaka
card.text: 1, T: Put a bounty counter on target permanent. Bounty — Whenever a permanent an opponent controls with a bouny counter on it is put into a graveyard, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until the end of your next turn.

card.name: Hot Pursuit
card.text: Bounty — When this enchantment enters and whenever a permanent an opponent controls with a bounty counter on it is put into a graveyard, put a bounty counter on target permanent. Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 for each bounty counter on them.

card.name: Hunt to Extinction
card.text: Put a bounty counter on each of up to two target permanents. Hunt to Extinction deals X damage to target opponent and each creature they control. Hunt to Extinction deals an additional X damage to each of those creatures with a bounty counter on it.

card.name: Images of the Past
card.text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield, then exile those creatures.

card.name: Iron Fist of the Empire
card.text: Hate — At the beginning of each end step, if an opponent lost life this turn, you may pay 2. If you do, you gain 2 life and create a 2/2 red Soldier creature token with first strike named Royal Guard.

card.name: Jabba the Hutt
card.text: Defender T: Put a bounty counter on target permanent. R, T: Create a tapped 4/4 red Hunter creature token. It fights target creature an opponent controls with a bounty counter on it. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Jedi Knight
card.text: When this creature leaves the battlefield, return up to one target nonland permanent you don’t control to its owner’s hand. 1U: Meditate. (Return this creature to its owner’s hand. The first Jedi spell you cast on your next turn costs 2 less to cast. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Jedi Sentinel
card.text: Flash When this creature enters, you may return another target creature you control and target creature you don’t control to their owners’ hands.

card.name: Kit Fisto
card.text: When Kit Fisto enters, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. 1U: Meditate. (Return this creature to its owner’s hand. The first Jedi spell you cast on your next turn costs 2 less to cast. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Luke Skywalker
card.text: Vigilance Whenever Luke Skywalker or another Jedi you control leaves the battlefield without dying, put two +1/+1 counters on target Jedi you control. 1U: Meditate. (Return this creature to its owner’s hand. The first Jedi spell you cast on your next turn costs 2 less to cast. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Maintenance Droid
card.text: T: Choose a card in your graveyard with a repair counter on it. Remove a repair counter from it or put another repair counter on it. Repair 4 (When this creature dies, put four repair counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a repair counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.text: Return each card with a repair counter on it from your graveyard to the battlefield. Create a 1/1 colorless Droid artifact creature token for each Droid you control.

card.name: Might of the Wild
card.text: Choose one — - Creatures with power 3 less can’t block this turn. - Destroy target artifact or enchantment. - Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Nute Gunray
card.text: Whenever an artifact you control enters, you may pay 1. If you do, draw a card. Do this only once each turn. 1, T, Sacrifice a nontoken artifact: Create a 1/1 colorless Droid artifact creature token.

card.text: +1 Until your next turn, up to one target creature you control gains vigilance and protection from the color of your choice. -1 Tap up to three target creatures. -7 You get an emblem with “Creatures you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance, first strike, and lifelink.”

card.name: Precipice of Mortis
card.text: If a Jedi entering or leaving the battlefield causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

card.name: Primal Instinct
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, then double the number of +1/+1 counters on that creature.

card.name: Qui-Gon Jinn
